flawed_nl_solution:
The variety pack costs $40 and rush shipping is an additional 30% so that's 40*0.3 = $12
The variety pack costs $40 and rush shipping is $12 so they will cost 40+12 = $<<40+12=52>>52
The order will cost $52 and he will get 4 types of fancy, sliced meats so each type costs 52/4 = $<<52/4=31>>31
#### 31

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 13, not 31. It appears two adjacent digits were swapped.
